text: Abdul Mejid () was a mullah and merchant from Kabul. He explored Central Asia (then called known as Tartary) for the British Empire.His name has been written many ways. These include Abdul Mejid, Abdul Mej√≠d, Abdul Medjid, Abdul-Medjid, Abdoul Medjid, and Abdool Mujeed. ==References== ===Citations=== ===Bibliography=== * . * . * * . * , printing a letter dated 19 October 1861. * . * . * . * . title: Abdul Mejid (explorer)
